timeline.bodyText: We have this info dump because there was a problem with headers being too large (HTTP violation). Just to tell you why this was done..  We could set it to debug, ok. Especially since it's not a problem anymore.
timeline.author: adamdickmeiss

replies.bodyText: Maybe we don't need to dump all headers even on debug level. As the most important will be in json fields (request ids and other).
replies.author: MikhailFokanov

timeline.bodyText: Why is this method not changed like others? logger.warn(msg, e)
timeline.author: hjiebsco

timeline.bodyText: There is an extra space before getReqId()
timeline.author: hjiebsco
